title: Senpai Ga Uzai-My senpai is annoying Ep.01
desc: A romantic comedy series depicting the life of Igarashi Futaba, an employee of a financial company, who is constantly in trouble with Takeda Harumi, her prestigious senior. Besides, there is the office love affair of Sakurai Touko and Kazuma Shouta as well as the ironic love story of the boy Sakurai Yuto and Igarashi's friend - Kurobe Natsumi.
